book.title: Sepher Yezirah - A Book on Creation
book.author: Isidor Kalisch
book.discription: One of the most important books on the Kabbalah, Sepher Yezirah is an outstanding meditation manual on the creation of the universe, both the microcosm and macrocosm. This clear English translation of a most ancient work exposes fundamental aspects of the ancient Kabbalah without superstitious interpretations.
